_header: Thy tongue is made of flesh and blood
Subjects: carols, of moral counsel; tongue, advice concerning use of
_description: A song of keeping the tongue — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Man bewar bewar bewar / & kepe the þat þou haue no car’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Þi tunge is mad of fleych & blodEuele to spekyn it is not
                    good…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Qwether we wake or slepe& our body fro euele
                    fare
